title: Bright Antenna Records
text:
Bright Antenna Records is an independent <a href="record%20label">record label</a>, founded in 2007 and based in <a href="Mill%20Valley%2C%20California">Mill Valley, California</a>. The label was created by producer Sep V and by writer <a href="Tiffanie%20DeBartolo">Tiffanie DeBartolo</a> and named after the lyrics to the song "<a href="The%20Spirit%20of%20Radio">The Spirit of Radio</a>" by <a href="Rush%20%28band%29">Rush</a>. Bright Antenna specializes in artist development and, in addition to its label services, operates an online store for its vinyl and specialty products. BA's staff includes <a href="Artists%20and%20repertoire">A&R</a> veteran Braden Merrick, who discovered and broke <a href="The%20Killers">The Killers</a>.
Roster.
